query: SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM campaigns WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR managed_by_admin = $8::boolean) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR managed_unit_amount = $10::int4) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR managed_unit_amount > $12::int4) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR managed_unit_amount < $14::int4) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR stripe_session_url = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR stripe_session_id = $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR advertiser_addr = $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR advertiser_addr LIKE $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR status = $24::campaign_status) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR status != $26::campaign_status) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR briefing_hash = $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR briefing_hash LIKE $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR briefing_json = $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR briefing_json LIKE $34::varchar) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR budget = $36::varchar) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR budget > $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR budget < $40::varchar) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR price_per_point = $42::varchar) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $44::varchar) AND (NOT $45::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $46::varchar) AND (NOT $47::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $48::boolean) AND (NOT $49::boolean OR valid_until = $50::timestamptz) AND (NOT $51::boolean OR report_hash = $52::varchar) AND (NOT $53::boolean OR created_at = $54::timestamptz) AND (NOT $55::boolean OR created_at > $56::timestamptz) AND (NOT $57::boolean OR force_hydrate = $58::boolean) AND (NOT $59::boolean OR total_collabs = $60::int4) AND (NOT $61::boolean OR total_spent = $62::varchar) AND (NOT $63::boolean OR total_budget = $64::varchar) AND (NOT $65::boolean OR impression_count = $66::int4) AND (NOT $67::boolean OR reply_count = $68::int4) AND (NOT $69::boolean OR repost_count = $70::int4) AND (NOT $71::boolean OR like_count = $72::int4)
